properties.name: installMode
properties.description: Used to specify the InstallMode used for the install operation. This is optional and defaults to InstallMode.ON_NEXT_RESTART.

properties.name: minimumBackgroundDuration
properties.description: If installMode === ON_NEXT_RESUME, the minimum amount of time (in seconds) which needs to pass with the app in the background before an update install occurs when the app is resumed.

properties.name: mandatoryInstallMode
properties.description: Used to specify the InstallMode used for the install operation if the update is mandatory. This is optional and defaults to InstallMode.IMMEDIATE.
